Mission.Author: KingRaptor
Mission.Description: The peace in the Transbaal system is shattered by the sudden emergence of an unknown alien fleet.
Mission.Name: Starcrossed Lovers Episode 1 - An Unknown Menace (Milfeulle)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action (Alternate)
TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
GG.SuspendCombat()
local elsiorID = GG.mission.FindUnitInGroup("Elsior") Spring.SetGameRulesParam("elsiorUnitID", elsiorID)
local units = Spring.GetTeamUnits(0) for i=1,#units do local unitID = units[i] GG.FlightControl.SetUnitHeading(unitID, math.rad(-135)) if unitID ~= elsiorID then local _,_,_,x,y,z = Spring.GetUnitPosition(unitID, true) GG.FlightControl.SetUnitPosition(unitID, x, y +math.random(25,150), z) end end
units = Spring.GetTeamUnits(1) for i=1,#units do local unitID = units[i] GG.FlightControl.SetUnitHeading(unitID, math.rad(45)) local _,_,_,x,y,z = Spring.GetUnitPosition(unitID, true) GG.FlightControl.SetUnitPosition(unitID, x, y +math.random(-50, 150), z) end

TriggerLogic.Name: Add Objective
TriggerLogic.Description: The alien fleet is confirmed hostile. Destroy all enemy vessels in the operation area.
TriggerLogic.Title: Destroy all enemies

TriggerLogic.Description: The Elsior is key to the Angel Wing's operations. Protect it at all costs.
TriggerLogic.Title: Protect the Elsior

TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
WG.Music.StartTrack("sounds/music/Time to Fight.ogg")
local string = "Remember, we know little about these aliens besides the fact that they're armed and dangerous. Please be careful out there." WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/tact_serious.png", nil, 8*30)
local string = "Don't worry, Tact! We'll protect you and the Elsior with everything we've got!" WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/milfeulle_happy.png", nil, 6*30)
local string = "Do these aliens think we're afraid of them?" WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/ranpha_serious.png", nil, 5*30)
local string = "We won't back down from anyone who threatens the people we've sworn to protect." WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/forte_normal.png", nil, 6*30)
local string = "All right! Angel Wing, begin combat!" WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/tact_aggressive.png", nil, 5*30)

local units = Spring.GetTeamUnits(1) or {} if #units == 0 then GG.mission.ExecuteTriggerByName("Victory") elseif #units == 1 then local unitDefID = Spring.GetUnitDefID(units[1]) local unitDef = UnitDefs[unitDefID] local x, y, z = Spring.GetUnitPosition(units[1]) --Spring.Echo(unitDef.name, x, y, z) end

WG.Music.StartTrack("sounds/music/Victory.ogg")
local string = "All enemy ships have been destroyed." WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/coco_normal.png", nil, 4.5*30)
string = "We won..." WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/tact_serious.png", nil, 3.5*30)
string = "But... what's this sickly feeling I have?" WG.AddConvo(string, 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/tact_angry.png", nil, 5*30)

local myTeamID = Spring.GetMyTeamID() local elsiorID = Spring.GetGameRulesParam("elsiorUnitID") if not elsiorID then local units = unitDefID and Spring.GetTeamUnitsByDefs(unitDefID) or unitDefIDBackup and Spring.GetTeamUnitsByDefs(unitDefIDBackup) if units then elsiorID = units[i] end end
if elsiorID then WG.BeautyShot(elsiorID) end
WG.Music.StopTrack()
WG.AddConvo("Hull critically damaged! Chrono String containment failing!", 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/almo_shocked.png", nil, 5.5*30) WG.AddConvo("All hands, abandon ship!", 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/lester_angry.png", nil, 3.5*30) WG.AddConvo("It's over...\nif only I had commanded better...", 12, "LuaUI/Images/portraits/tact_angry.png", nil, 5*30)
